mapper.insert:
insert into BYTERMID (termId, tMacId, osType, osVersion, vendor, model, ipv4, connectionType, operatorType, screenWidth, screenHeight) values
(#{item.termId}, #{item.tMacId}, #{item.osType}, #{item.osVersion}, #{item.vendor}, #{item.model}, #{item.ipv4}, #{item.connectionType}, #{item.operatorType}, #{item.screenWidth}, #{item.screenHeight})
mapper.update: update BYTERMID set termId=#{item.termId}, tMacId=#{item.tMacId}, osType=#{item.osType}, osVersion=#{item.osVersion}, vendor=#{item.vendor}, model=#{item.model},ipv4=#{item.ipv4}, connectionType=#{item.connectionType}, operatorType=#{item.operatorType}, screenWidth=#{item.screenWidth}, screenHeight=#{item.screenHeight}
